title: ByteDance Plans Massive AI Chip Spending Boost as Nvidia Demand Grows in China
description: Chinas technology giant ByteDance is preparing to significantly ramp up its artificial intelligence investment, with plans to spend about 100 billion yuan (approximately $14 billion) on AI chips in 2026, according to a...
